Name: Circle Tank
About the game: Circle Tank is a one-button minimalist coffee-break tank action game. Through three acts, mash uncontrollably as an onslaught of cuboid enemies threaten your existence. Intentionally awkward controls make this a rage-inducing challenge that will put you to the test. 90 DEGREES OF ACTION One button controls the direction of the titular Circle Tank. Turn 90 degrees clockwise and wonder, 'why is this called Circle Tank if the tank can't really move in a circular motion? It's more of a rectangle-- 'Rectankle' would have been a more fitting name, don't you think?' CANNONBALL HELL Dodge 'em up with different enemy types, projectiles, and a killer final boss. Randomized patterns and stage layouts make each attempt unique. A successful run will only take about 3 minutes, and the ability to toggle into a small window at any time makes this the perfect inconspicuous 'corner of your monitor' experience. CAN YOU SURVIVE?
